title: Hotdog-Sandwich Classification Consensus Framework

prerequisites: Identify and recruit key stakeholder representatives
steps.outcome: Authoritative body to set taxonomic standards and resolve disputes
risks: Disputes over council's legitimacy and decision-making process

prerequisites: Conduct comprehensive review of existing definitions and perspectives
Engage linguistic and culinary experts to define core taxonomic criteria
steps.outcome: A multi-dimensional taxonomy that accounts for structural, cultural, and practical factors
risks: Resistance to complexity over simple binary classifications

prerequisites: Establish clear procedures for submitting and adjudicating classification disputes
Empower the Classification Council to make binding determinations
steps.outcome: Reliable process for updating taxonomy and resolving conflicts
risks: Potential for politicization of the dispute resolution process
Challenges enforcing compliance with Council decisions

steps.action: Launch Public Education and Engagement Campaign
prerequisites: Develop accessible educational materials on the classification framework
Facilitate dialogues and debates to build shared understanding
steps.outcome: Broad public awareness and acceptance of the taxonomy
risks: Difficulty overcoming entrenched beliefs and biases
Potential for continued polarization and resistance

steps.action: Integrate the Classification Framework into Regulations and Standards
prerequisites: Collaborate with government agencies and industry bodies
Ensure the taxonomy is adopted for food labeling, menu definitions, etc.
steps.outcome: Practical implementation and enforcement of the classification system
risks: Regulatory capture and special interest influence
Challenges aligning diverse regulatory and industry stakeholders

resource_requirements: Diverse stakeholder representatives and subject matter experts
Funding for council operations, public engagement, and regulatory integration
Legal and policy expertise to develop dispute resolution procedures
Communications and marketing resources for educational campaign
